item.title: Hello? Anyone There?
item.description: #TODO: add in single observational call to budget simulation! current results reflext your call being answered not your problem being resolved This post will deal with how to approach a problem using simulation. Furthermore, some theory on the distribution of order statistics shall be touched on as well as some very basic Queueing Theory concepts. Context Say you are trying to reach an international number. It can cost a fortune to reach an operator on the other side of the world.
